paper_abstract: A new cluster based event-driven algorithm is developed to simulate the formation of clusters in a two-dimensional gas: particles move freely until they collide and "stick" together irreversibly. These clusters aggregate into bigger structures in an isotropic (random) way, forming fractal structures whose fractal dimension depends on the initial density of the system. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An event-driven algorithm for fractal cluster formation
